website_summaries.verdict: A high-pressure showerhead featuring antimicrobial technology for overall peace of mind.
pros: Designed to minimize the growth of mold, mildew, and bacteria
Anti-clog nozzles effectively provide improved pressure in a variety of settings

customer_reviews.title: Antimicrobial / Anti-Clog High-Pressure 6-setting Hand Shower
customer_reviews.text: On December 14th 2017, I purchased this product. This was a great product for at least 3 months ... I took a shower March 14th 2018 and the hose near the top ... next to the base was leaking and various spots - good 6 inches down the hose needless to say water going all over the place and lost my pressure that I had come accustomed to. Not a happy customer! Must be inferior product Within the coil, it seems that the rubber inside the hose was getting brittle or something was eating at it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Regret not buying this sooner. You can't tell the difference between this shower head and an expensive one- water pressure/different settings are awesome, SUPER easy to install and looks great. The hookup part is plastic but you'd never know; it's made very well and works just as well as the expensive stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DLI

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely... and I did it all by myself! If you knew me, you'd know that that means it must have been SUPER easy to install. I really appreciated that it came with everything that I needed. I most certainly would have noticed that I had forgotten to buy a necessary piece mid-install, so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: tina m williams

customer_reviews.title: No "mist" setting, contrary to product description
customer_reviews.text: The product description states that this has "Gentle Mist" and "Rain/Mist" settings. However, there was no setting that even vaguely resembled a mist. There were 5 slight variations of the conventional shower spray, and one where the water barely came out at all. Literally, if i held it so it sprayed straight up, the water would go about an inch into the air, and I have very good water pressure. I'd barely give this three stars if it weren't for the outright lie in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel T. Faulhaber

customer_reviews.title: Loved until now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower head and have only had it for about 3 months. I love the pressure and I thought the quality of the shower head was great until recently. I have water spewing everywhere from the hose and now I can barely shower. I will update this review after I hear back from the company that sells this shower head. I honestly just want a new one because maybe this one was just defective.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Otero

customer_reviews.title: Pivot?
customer_reviews.text: This was rated the best bang for the buck by best reviews. The install is quick and easy. My only issue with this hand held shower head is the overhead bracket is supposed to pivit. It looks like it should, but I couldn't budge it. I tried to hand loosen the bracket nut and failed again. I didn't want to use channel locks since it's plastic and might damage the appearance. I gave up and have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: steve l

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy, no tools at all. I did remove the flow regulator because our house water pressure is about 50psi and am happy with the results. We are on well water, of not great quality, so will see how it holds up. I really like the multiple settings. The only downside is our shower pipe was already high and this makes it even higher. I'm very happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Don Simas

customer_reviews.title: excellent shower head, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice shower head. It installed easily, and we love the different settings. The dial for changing the settings works so smoothly. The handle can be lifted out and put back very easily and there is a little rubber piece inside the holder that keeps the handle from moving around if you bump the hose, so it stays where you put it and doesn't end up spraying outside the shower. An excellent value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: the sal bug

customer_reviews.title: Hose turned into a sprinkler in a matter of months
customer_reviews.text: I installed this according to the directions and it worked perfectly fine for several months. A couple weeks ago a small leak began in the hose. Within a few days it was a major leak and others opened as well. It went from shower to one of those lawn hose extensions for kids to run through the spray of in the summer. I know nothing lasts forever, but under a year with regular use is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: the real Kira Stoyko

customer_reviews.title: Hose developed numerous massive leaks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Sep 2017 and today Apr 2019 (not even 2 years) the hose developed massive numerous leaks making the shower head ineffective. I looked for a hose replacement for Aquadance without success so I purchased a new hand held shower head by Moen. Hopefully a name brand will fare better. BTW there are only 2 people in my household.
customer_reviews.author: Roma1945

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower head!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so...initially I purchased a rainfall shower head. They are not really everything you ever want and more...it was fun at first, but there’s next to no water pressure, and if you have a big walk-in shower, cleaning becomes the biggest pain! Let me start by saying, this shower head cut my shower time in half! Excellent water pressure, I haven’t had any lime build up on it (so far), and I LOVE that I can take it off the hook to clean my entire shower!! You have multiple settings to choose from (which is great,) a long hose, and last but not least, SUPER easy installation! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower head!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to reduce bacterial exposure and biofilm build up. We were shocked to find how much we would love it for many other details. The water pressure is incredible through each of the shower options. It is super lightweight. I had no idea our other one was heavy until we got this. I have rheumatiod arthritis and the ease of handling this handle, hose and dial to change sprays has made a huge difference in my pain level. Crazy, I know, but totally true. HIGHLY RECCOMEND!
customer_reviews.author: unsinkablegirl

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance...
customer_reviews.text: ... on this as I needed something to help me with my sinus condition. I had a popular brand installed but it was impossible to keep clean. I was bleaching it almost daily trying to keep it clean. I am on city water. long story short; I was waking up every night with a throat full of sinus drainage. After installing this shower head it stopped the first day. I highly recommend this to anyone that has sinus issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Isenhour

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product met all my requirements. It is affordable, fully operational as advertised. High pressure and no leaks. It was really easy to install. The box was full of accessories, including plumbing tape that came in very handy. I enjoy my showers so much better with this shower head set set. Forget the naysayers... This was an awesome deal!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: My very own spa!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head especially with the addition of the filter. My water is trucked in to fill my tank and is hard and full of whatever. (Not my drinking water 😉). My skin is soft again, my yellowing hair is back to its silver and the shower is easier to clean. Definitely worth getting!!☮️
customer_reviews.author: Pacificarosa

customer_reviews.title: Well done product!
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to install shower tool. Easy to use and the functions all give different aspects that make this a benefit! There is also the ability to shut it off without turning off the shower which is a blessing when shaving ones legs or washing your dog as the temp stays and you don't have to "start all over" with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lahrian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by how well this shower head performs. I was a little worried since it is on the cheaper end, but it exceeded expectations. It looks nice as well. The water pressure is great! I had to adjust to it compared to what I was used to using with the previous shower head we had. I can't comment on the longevity of this shower head, but if anything changes or breaks down I'll be sure to come back and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Katykatmeow

customer_reviews.title: Strong water pressure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. The pressure is super strong and does the job. The price is great. I also purchased the 6 in for the main shower. We've had trouble finding a shower head for the main shower that have enough water pressure and tried 3 others till we got to this one. The price is very good when you look at what you would pay for something in the bigger retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality, Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in 8/2018 installed in December of 2018 and now I am having to replace it. I used this in my master shower everyday for 7 months until the metal cord that goes into the shower head started to break apart. It was first a little trickle so I put a little more water tape around the end and gently tightened the shower head back on but quickly realized it was the Metal Cord splitting at the seams. Waste of money, spend a little more and get a better quality one with a manufacturer's warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Neeners503

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got a deal on this shower head during Cyber Monday sales and couldn't be happier with my purchase. Was a little skeptical after reading a few of the reviews and the low price, but was not disappointed. We are temporarily in an apartment after relocating and the water pressure in the shower is not so strong. As advised in reviews, made sure not to over tighten during the less than 5 minute install and had no problems with it breaking or leaking. The water pressure improved tremendously! Having the different settings is nice, as well. My only regret is that I didn't get an additional one at that price for the other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Houghland

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hose and no pressure
customer_reviews.text: This shower head has less pressure than the one I replaced. The plastic piece connecting the hose to the shower broke during installation. We managed to attach the hose and finish the installation but there is very little water pressure. This is not worth the money it’s very light weight and made with cheap plastic materials. I’m not happy
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: Made my husband remove this shower head from our rental property and reinstall it in the house we recently purchased. I will not be without this shower head. Originally purchased because of repeated shower head mold and mildew that gallons of vinegar could not conquer while living in the swamp a#$ of Satan's butt crack, also known as Augusta, Georgia. Moved to Michigan - keeping it for the wonderful pressure and settings.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: High pressure baby!
customer_reviews.text: High pressure shower head. I looveeee it! I like a lot of pressure and this shower head is amazing. Helps you feel cleaner and less filmy from low flow non filtered showers. My sister had one in her place and I immediately ordered one for myself and I’m never looking back! I don’t like low flow or any shower that just feels like someone is spitting on me like a sad trickle, pathetic. This shower is the real deal. It’s only a bonus it filters out microbes, my main care is the pressure. Get ya self one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: So after 2 months of use the hose went bad. Already leaking. I am so disappointed. I like the pressure and different spray or nozzle settings but the hose seems to be made of very flimsy material for it to already be broken and leaking. I would like to think this is just a defective one out the lot but I will not waste money buying another to find out. I had my previous shower head with hise for 5+ years and it still wasn't broken when I changed. It was just the nozzle became dirty and worn.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice showerhead for cheap
customer_reviews.text: I changed out my stationary showerhead for this one that is a handheld. Was very easy to do, took about five minutes. Have been using it for several weeks now and it works great. Good power and the handheld option is great, as my showerhead spot is quite high and I’m short. Now my hair doesn’t get drenched unless I want it too. The different spray patterns are nice. I mainly use the basic one, but the pulse is nice for a bit of a back massage. Seems well constructed. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and installed it in just a few minutes without any tools and it works great. My wife was speaking with her mother and told her how much she liked the product and her mother said she really needed a new one because hers was old and not working very well so I ordered her one and installed it and she is very pleased with it. I would recommend this to anyone. Very good product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Laidback

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Our household is impressed! Great value, easy to install, loving how tall the shower head is when it's left in the bracket holder. It looks great and the shower stream is easy to adjust. I purchased this shower assembly for all my bathrooms. Not only because it looks good but because of the Microban series.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great shower head until now. After only a year the hose has started to leak. I would expect to get many more years out of a devise like this before there are breakdown problems. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Metalshaper

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Hose~
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the single head with hose in June of 2017, and was very pleased with its performance & ease of use~ Went to take a shower today and the hose was squirting water all over (totally unusable with no warning signs of leakage), .had to jump out of shower go to a store to replace with a new shower head...I've owned a few shower heads in my life, some good & some not so good...never have I had one that only lasted 13 months~ Beware!
customer_reviews.author: TooMany

customer_reviews.title: My previous shower head had pretty poor water pressure and thought that there was something ...
customer_reviews.text: My previous shower head had pretty poor water pressure and thought that there was something wrong with my water pressure. I installed this and it was night and day. I’d say the water pressure is too strong now. This is amazing and I’ve used it for about 2 months now. Other shower heads would get that pink mold on it, but there is no mold in sight with this! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower head
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head. Works well, great price. Nice that it's easy to remove the flow restrictor if one needs too. Flow is pretty good with flow restrictor in place. Only odd thing is that on the super massager mode, it makes a high pitched whine, as others have mentioned but it's not terrible. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Broke too soon
customer_reviews.text: This shower head worked amazing for the first two months or so, until the head completely broke off at the hose connection point. It literally sprayed water all over my ceilings when this happened. I don't do anything crazy with the shower head that could have caused it to break at all. It was very high pressured and I loved it until it broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head for the price! But it has cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Great showerhead for my apartment. The main connection from the showerhead to the main pipe has cheap plastic. When trying to use a wrench to tighten the connection, it cracked. Still works for now, but I am worried about it. There was not much grip around the portion I mentioned so it difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Otero

customer_reviews.title: Good Prodoct
customer_reviews.text: Truly surprised that the value for the money really well-made perfect for nguest shower or any addition in your home. That's because I have two kids works great will be ordering another!!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppinguru

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shower experience!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice hand held shower-head-heads . It is so nice the plumber that installed it took a picture of the box an said he is buying one. Which says a lot because his truck is full of parts etc...and he gets a great discount on anything he needs for personal use. It is one of the nicest shower-heads I ever had. That says a lot-I am an old lady! Nice powerful spray, and several settings. I love the fact it is anti-microbial.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, works great. no more annoying showerhead and it is so much easier to wash a baby and keep every corner of the tub clean with the handheld shower. I wish I did some measurements before, I feel the hose was a bit short for our bath. UPDATED REVIEW: After 5 months of working fine, it started suddenly leaking from various spots in the hose. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate the installation since I didn’t do it. Inked the house while he installed it. I find it best to do that when he is on a project. If not I tend to stress him out and get in his way when trying to help. With that said.... works wonderfully and I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kellerpn

customer_reviews.title: Goods showerheads for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to use 2 heads at once, the water pressure is lower with both but thats to be expected, The head is large and gives enough water to cover 2 people with both working. It was easy to install and seems strong enough to last, but thats the future. Also the massage function isnt as strong as other showerheads but that is personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: scott d spencer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shower head!  Hassle-free installation.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! As others have posted, the instructions and included plumber's tape make installing this shower head a very simple task. The pressure works for us, and while there is definitely a louder sound if you set it to vibrate, it is not as loud as other units we've had in the past. So, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for now, we’ll see tho
customer_reviews.text: I’m enjoying it, just follow instructions and don’t over tighten. It’s what I expected for the low price tag. BTW, I do enjoy taking showers again. It brought some life back to the showering experience (better pressure). Try it out just don’t be dropping it, it does seem like it will crack. Besides that it’s better than my last one. Have fun and stay clean. PS- I’ll update if this thing fails.
customer_reviews.author: Chip Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good shower head. Horrible hose.
customer_reviews.text: The shower head itself it great, but the hose it came with is garbage. Only after 2 months of use, the hose burst and water was spraying everywhere. I am purchasing a replacement hose already. I'd buy this product for a cheaper price if it didn't come with a hose. If you buy this shower head, get a different hose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The bad reviews are right
customer_reviews.text: Yup. Worked great until the hose started leaking everywhere. This is unacceptable for how long I’ve had it.(less than six months) Cheaply made don’t waste your money for something that is inevitably going to break. I hope this saves at least one potential buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Brambles

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love. It has the best massaging mode
customer_reviews.text: I was able to install this shower head in 5 minutes. The first time I used it, I fell in love. It has the best massaging mode! My husband and I have different bathrooms. He tried this shower head and now wants to share. I am buying him his own. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. bad leaks in less than 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I really should have tried to return this. The hose began leaking water sometime after only 7 or so months. Now many more leaks have appeared along the hose. This is a trash quality item. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Rexfelis

customer_reviews.title: Hose leaks like a fountain
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shower head, useless hose. I've used it less than half a year (even less as I mostly shower at the swim center, so this got very little use), and now the hose leaks like a fountain, essentially reducing water pressure at the head. Have not taken it apart, but am pretty sure the plastic liner split.
customer_reviews.author: Zoli

customer_reviews.title: Made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very light, so must be made of plastics. It still looks nice, so the only question is whether it lasts. It’s only $25, so I suppose it won’t last years and years. Let’s see.
customer_reviews.author: Raintiger

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Pressure!
customer_reviews.text: Provided amazing water pressure in a shower that has had a weak flow since installed 10 years ago. It was quick to install with all the info I needed in the short instructions. I was truly impressed by it. The only negative is the sound it makes on the massage setting, which I never use anyway.
customer_reviews.author: E. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this showerhead! I used it for the basement shower where I’d have to clean more frequently due to dampness and slight mold growth between cleaning. Now? No mold at all! It’s light weight. Nice water pressure too. Have already recommended to several people. 100% keeps the shower cleaner and mold free
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Rocking a great shower head!
customer_reviews.text: The shower head came promptly and was easy to install. The pressure is really strong. After struggling with little to no pressure in old shower head for months I wish I would have bought this a lot sooner. Great product and I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I can i wish they would change is the connector part to the water is plastic. It seems to be working okay (had item for about a month now) it doesn't restrict water flow which I must say it wonderful. Would definitely buy this again. And the only reason I gave it 4 was because of the plastic part.
customer_reviews.author: kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This works fine. It is lightweight, but that also brings into question how sturdy it will be overtime, but it was a simple install and works as expected. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good. but it is likely plastic stained with silver
customer_reviews.author: S. N.

customer_reviews.title: This shower head is great. It has several settings on it including an ...
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is great. It has several settings on it including an off switch, great for cleaning. It's a good size, and the hose is plenty long. Have not had it but a week so can't say about the antimicrobial anti clog portion of it but I can say that the texture of the sprouts are definitely antimicrobial product
customer_reviews.author: Diana Clarcq

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad shower head.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shower head. It still leaks just a small bit where the hose connects to the faucet attachment. I made sure it has the rubber washer and tightened it as much as possible. But it's not that bad. The head itself is great. And the hose isn't stiff like others. I do recommend this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: venomoutput

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few $ more for a better fixture
customer_reviews.text: Eh... bought for the kids shower and should have known not to set the expectations high. Installation was fine and once installed, it didn’t leak. The unit is low quality plastic though and tightening the pieces resulted in big grooves/scratches on the unit. Ultimately, I took it down and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Salts

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it
customer_reviews.text: Really appreciate the pause feature and the regular shower setting has a good pressure. Most I have tried are not strong enough to rinse the shampoo from my hair unless I put it on message setting and that's just annoying when trying to rinse. Will give it a bit more time but may just purchase another one for when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: StacyL

customer_reviews.title: This is good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very light, many different spray settings, seems to resist that water residue crap that built up on my old one. It's been a few months now and no leaking and working great. I did remove the flow restrictor when I installed it and pressure is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: This shower head is amazing. The settings are just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am disabled and need a hand held shower so I can rinse off. This shower head is amazing. The settings are just what I needed. It gives a nice message as you rinsing off and it's light weight. The only concern is the very lasting setting sounds like it has a motor that turns on and it is a little to powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeadak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this shower head. Have been using it for a couple months now and it continues to work great. Installed very easily. Has a great water pressure. Looks great in my shower. Love the green nozzles because it matches my bathroom. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: the product is very good, functional well
customer_reviews.text: the product is very good,functional well. the only problem is that you need to loos adjustment part, it's way toooooo tight. my friend is a plummer, he knew that the adjustment part needs to be loos, normal people like me would not know. hope the seller could tell the manufacturer to solve this problem
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: AquaDance shower head
customer_reviews.text: good looking and useful products by AquaDance (both Color), enough water pleasure for daily shower needs. PW
customer_reviews.author: paulo W

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to be of better quality than most of these I have used in ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be of better quality than most of these I have used in the past as replacements. The hose itself seemed high quality and even though we have low water pressure at our rural Minnesota home, this shower head kicks out a nice level of water! I would definitely buy this brand again and the seller shipped super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Good price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shower head. It's very powerful and sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Kibbe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, good shower pressure
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower head. It took less than 5 minutes for me to install, and I'm a bit girly and can usually never do these things on my own but this product was super easy. Shower pressure is awesome now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley White

customer_reviews.title: Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice shower head. My only complaint is that the part you attach to the water source was "stuck". It could not be adjusted up or down, at least I couldn't do it. My husband finally got it to budge a bit. He was afraid that he would break it, but thankfully he didn't. Other than that... I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Norgard

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install plus water comes out really washing your body clean. Power jet settings are forceful and great message. Overall This is a keeper for actice people.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Brown

customer_reviews.title: Missing information on Details....
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY like this showerhead. Unfortunately, it WON'T work on my shower, hence my mid-range rating. Accurate information pre-purchase would have saved me some grief.
customer_reviews.author: Lily McD

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 2 of these within the past 17 months. Both were installed properly and have normal daily use, yet both have cracked and leak. Very disappointing. I won't be buying a 3rd. Should last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: jjorr777

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grown son. This is his report. Everything great except needed longer cord; unable to wash dogs in shower. Needs little more force on the massaging part.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ridley

customer_reviews.title: You will not be diappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great Pressure. Stop wasting money on other products. This is the best shower head I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: LADA

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I had problem with was the little grating mesh from the first step. It got distorted right away and caused a leak, so I bypassed it altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Ilyavid

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Wow, talk about pressure. I recently replaced my old janky shower head with this model, and it sure does what it says! It's so high pressure a couple of the settings are tough to use for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: lightsyouonfire

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time. Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: This item is worthless. It's made of cheap composite plastic and breaks when you tighten it. Not worth $10. Don't waste time and money.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; easy to install - you are walked through every step of installation with illustrations - and you even get trouble shooting answers if your old shower head apparatus is not coming off as it should or if it leaks. It took me 10 minutes to remove the old shower head and install the new Microban head. It is light in weight, attractive and works great with all the choices for water flow. Just a really, really good product that promises a good experience and then delivers that good experience!
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: So easy to to install!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. From opening the box to getting in the shower it took much less than 10 minutes and the water pressure was phenomenal. I can’t believe the price. This is definitely a fantastic buy. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Just me!

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head But Hose Broke within Months
customer_reviews.text: The shower head works well thus far I've had this several months. However, the hose gave out and now I have to search for a replacement or buy another shower head, whichever costs less. So the longevity component of quality may not be what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: sanningen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most expensive choice, but the best for the money. (I tried others.) Follow directions for proper installation. Shower flow options worke well with positive "click" control positioning. Nice clean design.
customer_reviews.author: transgression

customer_reviews.title: Great price, look
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the water pressure and settings of this. When I unboxed, it seemed really small, and I was worried I’d not have enough spray space. I was wrong. The water covers almost too much area, but I’d rather that than standing in the shower feeling cold. Great price, look, feel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't a lot of play in the actual part that holds the nozzle up, and sometimes it feels like it might break because of the plastic. It puts out good pressure though. And it has some awesome settings.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Newbold

customer_reviews.title: Wimpy output
customer_reviews.text: Even though I removed the flow restrictor, the water pressure coming out of the head is nothing like the one this replaced. Although I will be keeping this, I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous but honest

customer_reviews.title: Leaky shower hose
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this type of shower head that I've had over the last 5-6 months. The 1st started leaking from the hose within about a month and the replacement started leaking as of today which I've had since November 17th. Not sure why this keeps happening but It looks like I am now outside of my replacement window as of 13 days ago. So, not a good product if it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Karem

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Less water pressure than our old shower head. It is lightweight, but feels cheap. We will see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: megn_bailey

customer_reviews.title: **HOSE WILL LEAK AFTER REGULAR USE** DON'T WASTE YOUR $$!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. You are better off paying more for one that will last. The hose didn't last two years, as other reviewers have stated. I guess I was lucky mine lasted this long. The hose bursted unexpectedly, getting water all over the bathroom, ceiling, near electric fan. Avoid this product, spend more and get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Showers are so much better now
customer_reviews.text: This changed my apartment’s shower from total crap to heaven. Easy install for the non-mechanically inclined. Came with some tiny roll of plastic tape that kept it from leaking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: We love our new shower head! The water pressure is adjustable and we love it’s flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA DORSON

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a month when the hose broke in several places and started spraying everywhere. My dads a plumber and took a look at it. Its completely busted. very unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shower head
customer_reviews.text: I really love the new shower head,,,its build kinda cheap don't know how long it will last,,afraid to drop it it might break,,,but it works great, has all those different setting..looks good easy to set up ...thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design &function
customer_reviews.text: Love - I bought this for my father’s shower in his Jamaica home and he is very satisfied. Plus it has antibicrobial features to filter water . The price was great also ... 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.author: Blackanese76

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks and works great. Replaced an old shower wand that had nozzles that were starting to break down and had water shooting in various directions. Easy and low cost fix to make the shower like new again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lok

customer_reviews.title: ... the instructions when your install and you should be good to go
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions when your install and you should be good to go. I was pleasantly surprised that included the Teflon plumber tape. I love the different settings on it and it installed quickly and easily. It definitely makes giving my dog a bath much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent lots of money and years trying to find a shower head that I like. For the money, this is the bomb. It’s like pressure washing myself! If it only lasts a year with our hard water, I’ll gladly buy another. I’m tempted to buy several more just to have a backup or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K. McCall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shower Head Can Be Yours, Too
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC shower head with OUTSTANDING water pressure! Easy to install (plumber's tape is recommended to ensure a tight fit) and looks great with nearly any decor. FiveStars.
customer_reviews.author: ManofSteelo

customer_reviews.title: It's Magic.  Effective increase if water pressure amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have weak water pressure. With this shower head, the effective water pressure seems incredible. Way too early to assess the antimicrobial and anti-clog aspects of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon L. Sweigart

customer_reviews.title: Great for now
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any issues with it yet, is really light weighted, perfect for my mom that has back issues, this shower head is really easy to handle and water pressures comes out great. I will update if anything goes wrong in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: AlexUnboxingChannel

customer_reviews.title: Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It's been a few weeks and I'm not seeing any mold or algae on it - yet. I like the different spray types and my wife spends about twice the time in the shower as she normally does - so - I think she likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Cambest

customer_reviews.title: Full plastic product
customer_reviews.text: I expected more solid product but this one is all plastic except the connector . not sure how it will work. very easy to install and very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kianoosh Z.

customer_reviews.title: Several settings
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. My old one had poor settings and did not provide a very good spray. This one is great and has several different settings that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: ForThePups

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP
customer_reviews.text: I bought one about a year ago and thought it was my fault that it had leaked badly from the hose because I left it hanging. So, I bought this one. Big mistake. In the same amount of time - about 8 months - it started leaking very badly from several points on the hose. Hardly anything comes out of the shower head part.
customer_reviews.author: michele dicubellis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Had low water pressure, and then I bought this and it’s a night and day difference. The Multiple water spray settings is an added bonus. Very easy to install. Will Buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Puglover

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Leaks a little, short and small handle. Doesn't fit down in holder all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Peanut&Jack
